Plot: Another episode of the newsmagazine Uncovered America offers a glimpse inside the world of the sport of hunting. Brett Blackham has the story. This movie was made for the 2013 48 Hour Film ...
Title: Uncovered America: Open Season
Writer: Brad Ashton (story), Jeremy Hansen (story), Steven Heumann (story), Steven Heumann, Tyler Pollock (story), Andrew Schvaneveldt (story), Andrew Tyler (story)
Actors: Brad Ashton, Justin Beecher, Brett Blackham, Kylie Coats
